Pagination

Pagination is for paginating. Use the rel attributes of the "Previous" and "Next" anchors to indicate prev or next. Not only is it good markup, we use it as a styling hook for adding the nifty arrows.

.nav-pagination

  • ←
  • 1
  • 2
  • 8
  • 9
  • →

Append-style paging

We often have a list of stuff that has a "see more" button at the bottom that ajax appends more content. The feed or meetups list on group home does this.

.nav-appendPager

A few things

  • Leggings Austin minim readymade aliquip, elit voluptate aesthetic. Cosby sweater organic single-origin coffee aliquip adipisicing, food truck american apparel. Aesthetic high life qui retro cliche.

Button groups (filtering)

Buttons joined in groups, presented as a list of options. Most useful for filtering/sorting lists, but we may be able to use this for other things.

.nav-buttons

Sort by:
  • Date Joined
  • Size
  • Name
  • Role

Segmented control (using radio buttons)

Pretty radio button control that look like sassquatch .nav-buttons

.segmented-control, .segmented-control-segment, .segmented-control-input, .segmented-control-button

Bringing guests? (expands to 100% of parent)

Tabs

Rounded tab navigation. Used mostly as secondary navigation on Meetup; load the tab content with web:ajax where possible.

.nav-tabs

  • Upcoming Meetups
  • Past Meetups
  • Selected tab
